{"handle": "wallet", "community": {"tag": "wallet", "name": "Wallet Builders", "addons": [{"id": "yv73uj", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Overview\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"The NEAR Wallet Community consist of a \\\\u{2692}\\\\u{fe0f} public builder group and a selected working group of \\\\u{1f9e0} SMEs (Subject Matter Experts)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **Working Group**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis formal group is a selected committee of subject matter experts who make official decisions on proposals and questions related to standards that affect NEAR Wallet builders. They follow a strict process to review proposals, recommend funding to DAO or grant programs, and hold grant takers accountable. They engage with the broader community to understand their needs and encourage ideation.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Members**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- **[Daryl Collins](https://github.com/MaximusHaximus)**\\\\\\\\n- **[Cameron Dennis](https://github.com/cameron-NEAR)**\\\\\\\\n- **[Osman Abdelnasir](https://github.com/esaminu)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Builder Group\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis informal self-organized group provides a space for anyone interested in the NEAR Wallets. Members of this group include most all the leading wallet teams on NEAR, SDKs, onramps/offramps, and relevant stakeholders at Pagoda, NEAR Foundation, and Banyan. While this group does not make official decisions, it offers a great opportunity to meet with others to share ideas and submit proposals\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## **How to get involved**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- Join the Builder group\\\\\\'s dedicated [Telegram channel](https://nearbuilders.com/tg-wallet) to learn about the latest discussions and activities. Don\\\\u{2019}t forget to introduce yourself.\\\\\\\\n- Register for the weekly calls [here](https://nearbuilders.com/wallet-calendar)   Review previous [call notes/recordings](https://nearbuilders.com/wallet-notes).  or check the pinned messages on Telegram\\\\\\\\n- Participate in discussions: Comment on existing ideas or discussions. Or propose a new idea.\\\\\\\\n- Volunteer to speak about a topic or lead a meeting.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n# Resources\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- Original Governance Post [nearbuilders.com/wallet-post](http://nearbuilders.com/wallet-post)\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Wiki 1"}, {"id": "oid2ep", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Meetings\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"## **Community Calls**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe Wallet Builder Group host regular calls weekly at Tuesday at 12PM EST  (register [here](https://nearbuilders.com/wallet-calendar)). All calls can be found here. [nearbuilders.com/wallet-videos](http://nearbuilders.com/wallet-videos) \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## **Work Group Calls**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe Wallet Standards Work Group may host public formal calls to review specific proposals, discuss attestations, or vote on decisions to review Wallet related proposals\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n| Meeting Name | Recording |\\\\\\\\n| --- | --- |\\\\\\\\n| Wallet Standards Working Group Meeting \\\\u{2013} October 21, 2022  | https://youtu.be/JQu8tObzhlM |\\\\\\\\n| Wallet Standards Working Group Meeting \\\\u{2013} January 17, 2023 | https://youtu.be/Y6z7lUJSUuA |\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Wiki 2"}], "admins": ["theori.near", "joespano.near", "orangejoe.near"], "handle": "wallet", "logo_url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreihdu5bsnvxoxi62j24ljd4o5gfebtgtn6gaj3n4ebq23qoprn7tou", "banner_url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreidtepnsgjd4f6jodd7ge4mpxs3vqtzxkfhnycvs6a5pmnfriyv47u", "description": "Building Wallet infrastructure on NEAR", "website_url": "https://nearbuilders.com/wallet", "bio_markdown": "A community of NEAR wallet founders, builders and core-contributors that are dedicated to ensuring security and innovation of the NEAR wallet ecosystem.", "github_handle": "NEARBuilders/CommunityGroups", "twitter_handle": "NEARHacks", "telegram_handle": null}}

They follow a strict process to review proposals, recommend funding to DAO or grant programs, and hold grant takers accountable. They engage with the broader community to understand their needs and encourage ideation.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Members**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- **[Daryl Collins](https://github.com/MaximusHaximus)**\\\\\\\\n- **[Cameron Dennis](https://github.com/cameron-NEAR)**\\\\\\\\n- **[Osman Abdelnasir](https://github.com/esaminu)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Builder Group\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis informal self-organized group provides a space for anyone interested in the NEAR Wallets. While this group does not make official decisions, it offers a great opportunity to meet with others to share ideas and submit proposals\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## **How to get involved**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- Join the Builder group\\\\\\'s dedicated [Telegram channel](https://nearbuilders.com/tg-wallet) to learn about the latest discussions and activities. Don\\\\u{2019}t forget to introduce yourself.\\\\\\\\n- Register for the weekly calls [here](https://nearbuilders.com/wallet-calendar)   Review previous [call notes/recordings](https://nearbuilders.com/wallet-notes).  or check the pinned messages on Telegram\\\\\\\\n- Participate in discussions: Comment on existing ideas or discussions. All calls can be found here. [nearbuilders.com/wallet-videos](http://nearbuilders.com/wallet-videos) \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## **Work Group Calls**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe Wallet Standards Work Group may host public formal calls to review specific proposals, discuss attestations, or vote on decisions to review Wallet related proposals\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n| Meeting Name | Recording |\\\\\\\\n| --- | --- |\\\\\\\\n| Wallet Standards Working Group Meeting \\\\u{2013} October 21, 2022  | https://youtu.be/JQu8tObzhlM |\\\\\\\\n| Wallet Standards Working Group Meeting \\\\u{2013} January 17, 2023 | https://youtu.be/Y6z7lUJSUuA |\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Wiki 2"}], "admins": ["theori.near", "orangejoe.near", "victorkanu1.near"], "handle": "wallet", "logo_url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreihdu5bsnvxoxi62j24ljd4o5gfebtgtn6gaj3n4ebq23qoprn7tou", "banner_url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreidtepnsgjd4f6jodd7ge4mpxs3vqtzxkfhnycvs6a5pmnfriyv47u", "description": "Building Wallet infrastructure on NEAR", "website_url": "https://nearbuilders.com/wallet", "bio_markdown": "A community of NEAR wallet founders, builders and core-contributors that are dedicated to ensuring security and innovation of the NEAR wallet ecosystem.", "github_handle": "NEARBuilders/CommunityGroups", "twitter_handle": "NEARHacks", "telegram_handle": null}}

{"handle": "wallet", "community_addon": {"id": "yv73uj", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Overview\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"The NEAR Wallet Community consist of a \\\\u{2692}\\\\u{fe0f} public builder group and a selected working group of \\\\u{1f9e0} SMEs (Subject Matter Experts)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **Working Group**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis formal group is a selected committee of subject matter experts who make official decisions on proposals and questions related to standards that affect NEAR Wallet builders. They follow a strict process to review proposals, recommend funding to DAO or grant programs, and hold grant takers accountable. They engage with the broader community to understand their needs and encourage ideation.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Builder Group\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis informal self-organized group provides a space for anyone interested in the NEAR Wallets. Members of this group include most all the leading wallet teams on NEAR, SDKs, onramps/offramps, and relevant stakeholders at Pagoda, NEAR Foundation, and Banyan. While this group does not make official decisions, it offers a great opportunity to meet with others to share ideas and submit proposals\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## **How to get involved**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- Join the Builder group\\\\\\'s dedicated [Telegram channel](https://nearbuilders.com/tg-wallet) to learn about the latest discussions and activities. Don\\\\u{2019}t forget to introduce yourself.\\\\\\\\n- Register for the weekly calls [here](https://nearbuilders.com/wallet-calendar)   Review previous [call notes/recordings](https://nearbuilders.com/wallet-notes).  or check the pinned messages on Telegram\\\\\\\\n- Participate in discussions: Comment on existing ideas or discussions. Or propose a new idea.\\\\\\\\n- Volunteer to speak about a topic or lead a meeting.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n# Resources\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- Original Governance Post [nearbuilders.com/wallet-post](http://nearbuilders.com/wallet-post)\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Wiki 1"}}

{"data": {"wallet.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Wallet Builders", "tags": {"wallet": "", "community": "", "announcements": ""}, "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreihdu5bsnvxoxi62j24ljd4o5gfebtgtn6gaj3n4ebq23qoprn7tou"}, "linktree": {"github": "NEARBuilders/CommunityGroups", "twitter": "NEARHacks", "website": "near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=wallet", "telegram": null}, "description": "A community of NEAR wallet founders, builders and core-contributors that are dedicated to ensuring security and innovation of the NEAR wallet ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\nLearn more about our community [on DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=wallet).", "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreidtepnsgjd4f6jodd7ge4mpxs3vqtzxkfhnycvs6a5pmnfriyv47u"}}}, "discussions.wallet.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Wallet Builders (Community Discussions)", "tags": {"wallet": "", "community": "", "discussions": ""}, "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreihdu5bsnvxoxi62j24ljd4o5gfebtgtn6gaj3n4ebq23qoprn7tou"}, "linktree": {"github": "NEARBuilders/CommunityGroups", "twitter": "NEARHacks", "website": "near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=wallet", "telegram": null}, "description": "Building Wallet infrastructure on NEAR\\\\n\\\\nLearn more about our community [on DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=wallet).", "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreidtepnsgjd4f6jodd7ge4mpxs3vqtzxkfhnycvs6a5pmnfriyv47u"}}}}}

{"addons": [{"id": "yv73uj", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Overview\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"The NEAR Wallet Community consist of a \\\\u{2692}\\\\u{fe0f} public builder group and a selected working group of \\\\u{1f9e0} SMEs (Subject Matter Experts)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **Working Group**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis formal group is a selected committee of subject matter experts who make official decisions on proposals and questions related to standards that affect NEAR Wallet builders. They follow a strict process to review proposals, recommend funding to DAO or grant programs, and hold grant takers accountable. They engage with the broader community to understand their needs and encourage ideation.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Builder Group\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis informal self-organized group provides a space for anyone interested in the NEAR Wallets. Members of this group include most all the leading wallet teams on NEAR, SDKs, onramps/offramps, and relevant stakeholders at Pagoda, NEAR Foundation, and Banyan. While this group does not make official decisions, it offers a great opportunity to meet with others to share ideas and submit proposals\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## **How to get involved**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- Join the Builder group\\\\\\'s dedicated [Telegram channel](https://nearbuilders.com/tg-wallet) to learn about the latest discussions and activities. Don\\\\u{2019}t forget to introduce yourself.\\\\\\\\n- Register for the weekly calls [here](https://nearbuilders.com/wallet-calendar)   Review previous [call notes/recordings](https://nearbuilders.com/wallet-notes).  or check the pinned messages on Telegram\\\\\\\\n- Participate in discussions: Comment on existing ideas or discussions. Or propose a new idea.\\\\\\\\n- Volunteer to speak about a topic or lead a meeting.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n# Resources\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- Original Governance Post [nearbuilders.com/wallet-post](http://nearbuilders.com/wallet-post)\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Overview"}, {"id": "oid2ep", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Meetings\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"## **Community Calls**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe Wallet Builder Group host regular calls weekly at Tuesday at 12PM EST  (register [here](https://nearbuilders.com/wallet-calendar)). All calls can be found here. [nearbuilders.com/wallet-videos](http://nearbuilders.com/wallet-videos) \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## **Work Group Calls**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe Wallet Standards Work Group may host public formal calls to review specific proposals, discuss attestations, or vote on decisions to review Wallet related proposals\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n| Meeting Name | Recording |\\\\\\\\n| --- | --- |\\\\\\\\n| Wallet Standards Working Group Meeting \\\\u{2013} October 21, 2022  | https://youtu.be/JQu8tObzhlM |\\\\\\\\n| Wallet Standards Working Group Meeting \\\\u{2013} January 17, 2023 | https://youtu.be/Y6z7lUJSUuA |\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Meetings"}], "handle": "wallet"}

{"data": {"wallet.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Wallet Builders", "tags": {"wallet": "", "community": "", "announcements": ""}, "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreihdu5bsnvxoxi62j24ljd4o5gfebtgtn6gaj3n4ebq23qoprn7tou"}, "linktree": {"github": "near/wallet-selector", "twitter": "NEARHacks", "website": "near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=wallet", "telegram": "+8s315V2dlYFkMmUx"}, "description": "A community of NEAR wallet founders, builders and core-contributors that are dedicated to ensuring security and innovation of the NEAR wallet ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\nLearn more about our community [on DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=wallet).", "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreidtepnsgjd4f6jodd7ge4mpxs3vqtzxkfhnycvs6a5pmnfriyv47u"}}}, "discussions.wallet.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Wallet Builders (Community Discussions)", "tags": {"wallet": "", "community": "", "discussions": ""}, "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreihdu5bsnvxoxi62j24ljd4o5gfebtgtn6gaj3n4ebq23qoprn7tou"}, "linktree": {"github": "near/wallet-selector", "twitter": "NEARHacks", "website": "near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=wallet", "telegram": "+8s315V2dlYFkMmUx"}, "description": "Building Wallet infrastructure on NEAR\\\\n\\\\nLearn more about our community [on DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=wallet).", "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreidtepnsgjd4f6jodd7ge4mpxs3vqtzxkfhnycvs6a5pmnfriyv47u"}}}}}

{"handle": "tooling", "community_addon": {"id": "kp910a", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Tools Community Calls\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\" The community calls are informal sessions where we share updates, discuss tooling and present projects in the NEAR ecosystem.\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThese sessions are now at a regular interval taking place **Every Second Tuesday of the month** if you dont want to miss those make sure you follow **[DevHub Community Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/2/r?cid=c_f54ed37fd92327acdc7e4343fe40722ae5797b6c82929ba93e9f3a89c69657ab@group.calendar.google.com&pli=1)**. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nIf you want to present your work, suggest discussion topics or simply get in touch - **[Join our Telegram group](https://t.me/NEAR_Tools_Community_Group)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nHere are the recaps of our most recent community calls:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #5: Apr 9, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #5](https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreigo3mpikbg2ogjipjonelfbvnrtypx6hkyr3rszaicyi3pgxhwyou)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EDCoWObguVs)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube: [Tools Community Call #5 \\\\u{2013} near/dev/hub](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EDCoWObguVs)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Recap:**\\\\\\\\n- **Vlad** Presents the updates of Rust SDK - v5.1 That reduces the boiler plate necessary for writing smart contracts.\\\\\\\\n  Next version coming soon will bring \\\\u{201c}iterable map\\\\u{201d}.\\\\\\\\n- **LedgerApp** rewrite in Rust is complete and going through a formal security audit. Expecting to go live in May\\\\\\\\n- **[Cargo Near](https://github.com/near/cargo-near)** and **rust-sdk** are getting integrated with **SourceScan** making the contracts source code verifiable and discoverable\\\\\\\\n checkout the [NEP-330 here](https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/533)\\\\\\\\n- **Morgan** presents **Okashi.dev** rewrite he did for ETH Denver simulating Near environment for interacting with smart contracts in the browser locally :blown:\\\\\\\\n- **Re:Public** showcase their entry for ETH London and present [their roadmap and proposal](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=33)\\\\\\\\n- **[bos-workspace](https://github.com/NEARBuilders/bos-workspace)** had a rewrite making it more modular and easier to be worked with presented by **Elliot**\\\\\\\\n- **Yuval** - tight for record holder attendee of the community calls recaps Q1 and great stats of **LavaNet.xyz** speaks about what\\\\\\'s next\\\\\\\\n- **Zahid** Recaps [Q1 updates](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LuwX8InOQdU&ab_channel=JutsuAI) and [milestones](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/jutsu-devhub-collaboration-q1-milestones-tryjutsu-zacec/?trackingId=pgauiK2OUj2s782z5cIhfw%3D%3D). Shares the [roadmap](https://trello.com/b/NUIKq7dq/jutsu-public-roadmap) for **Jutsu.ai**\\\\\\\\n- **NearBlocks** represented by **Luke** Shares some stats and recent updates supporting our ecosystem.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #4: Wed Mar 6, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #4](https://i.imgur.com/eR30Vrg.jpeg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rd3Vn09c-Goi)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube: [Tools Community Group Call #4 \\\\u{2013} near/dev/hub](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcKigCtsHDo)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Recap:**\\\\\\\\n**Zahid** demoes copilot and generative UI feature built in** Jutsu.ai**.\\\\\\\\n**Yuval** overviews **LavaNet.xyz **and introduces Lava Points, provides stats of current usage.\\\\\\\\n**Euguene** introduces **FastNear.com** and talks about the infrastructure problems it aiming to solve.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### **[Community Call] #3: Feb 21, 2024**\\\\\\\\n[![Tools Community Call #3](https://i.imgur.com/UdPKO4F.jpeg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcKigCtsHDo&list=PLrLLmjcJVAB9RoK95udIqkVE_JqHt_CCd)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Watch on YouTube [Tools Community Group Call #3 \\\\u{2013} near/dev/hub](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcKigCtsHDo&list=PLrLLmjcJVAB9RoK95udIqkVE_JqHt_CCd)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Recap:**\\\\\\\\n- **Oleg Kuzmin** discusses the new implementation of **LedgerApp**.\\\\\\\\n- **Ricardo** presents his team and **AgorApp** https://agorapp.dev.\\\\\\\\n- **Guillermo** shares about recently updated **near-cli** https://github.com/near/near-cli.\\\\\\\\n- **Jaswinder** from Harmonic Guild presents their current work on **near-api-rs** https://github.com/Harmonic-Guild/nea...\\\\\\\\n- **S\\\\u{e9}rgio Seco** introduces **near-relay** https://github.com/SurgeCode/near-relay.\\\\\\\\n- **Frol** talks about **NEAR\\\\\\'s Rust Stack**.\\\\\\\\n- **Zahid** from **Jutsu.ai** gives a last-minute heads-up that breaking changes have been introduced, with more to be announced and discussed on the next community call.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**All sessions can be found on the [DevHub YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vg9LYGLU7ok&list=PLrLLmjcJVAB9RoK95udIqkVE_JqHt_CCd)**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Community Calls"}}
